abstract: HSBC said on Monday that it was discussing the potential sale of its 15.6 percent stake in Ping An Insurance of China, which could be worth more than $9 billion.
snippet: HSBC said on Monday that it was discussing the potential sale of its 15.6 percent stake in Ping An Insurance of China, which could be worth more than $9 billion.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG – HSBC Holdings said on Monday that it was in talks about selling its stake in Ping An Insurance of China, which could be worth more than $9 billion.

headline.main: HSBC May Sell $9 Billion Stake in Chinese Insurer
